alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Estancia Valley; Far Northeast Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area; Quay County; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 04 at 11:05AM MST until March 04 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, West Central Mountains, West Central Highlands, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains, East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Estancia Valley, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass, Far Northeast Highlands, and Quay County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust may reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
